summary: TAKATA RECALL  MANUFACTURER RECALL G1P  NHTSA RECALL NO. 16V-340    ORIGINAL NOTICE DATE - MAY 23RD, 2016. DEALERSHIP WAS NOTIFIED OF DEFECTIVE PART, AND OWNER WAS INFORMED TO "WAIT UNTIL NECESSARY PARTS ARRIVE" IN FALL 2016. OVER 6 MONTHS LATER, STILL NO WORD. 1 YEAR, 1 MONTH AFTER ORIGINAL NOTICE, STILL NO FIX OR WORD FROM DEALERSHIP. OWNER AND FAMILY ARE UNABLE TO SAFELY DRIVE THIS VEHICLE PURCHASED IN 2015 BECAUSE OF DEFECTIVE SAFETY FEATURES, AND ARE PAYING MONTHLY FEES TO SIT AND LOOK AT A VEHICLE THAT IS NO LONGER SAFE TO DRIVE. RESALE OF THE VEHICLE IS NOT AVAILABLE, DEALERSHIP CLAIMS THEY WILL BUY THE CAR UNDER VALUE TO SELL FOR PARTS, LEAVING A NEGATIVE EQUITY OF THOUSANDS FOR THE OWNER TO PAY. THIS NEEDS TO BE REMEDIED.  COMPLAINT DATE: 07/03/2017
